Class-Rogue 20 -- Male Half-Elf Rogue: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 20 (+5) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Hermit Alignment: Neutral Deity: Pharasma (N)
Experience: 19228/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Cloud Step: Can Stride over insubstantial surfaces and weight-triggered traps
Implausible Infiltration: (2) Can move through up to 10' of wood, plaster, or stone
Light Step: Can Stride or Step normally over difficult terrain

Assurance (Cave Lore): Can take an automatic 34 on Cave Lore checks
Assurance (Elven Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Elven Lore checks
Assurance (Folktale Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Folktale Lore checks
Delay Trap: (R) Successful +5 DC Thievery check delays or disables triggering trap activation; critical failure inflicts flat-footed until the start of the next turn
Dubious Knowledge: Normal failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Expeditious Search: Can Search at 4x normal speed
Group Impression: Can use Diplomacy to Make An Impression with 2 targets
Hidden Paragon: (R) Successful Hide or Sneak vs. all foes allows becoming invisible for 1 min once per hr
Poison Weapon: Can prepare 20 poisons that inflict 1d4 HP poison during daily prep
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze at full Speed
Sense The Unseen: (R) Makes undetected foes hidden after a failed Seek
Sneak Savant: Normal failures on Sneak actions are successes
Subtle Theft: Successful Steal inflicts -2 Perception on observers to detect/Remains undetected when using Palm An Object or Steal after a successful Create A Diversion
Trap Finder: Gives +2 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require legendary proficiency in Thievery
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Rogue: 41 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Bastard Sword (+30 1d8+4 S [2h d12]; strength; master); Fist (+31 1d4+5 B; dexterity; master); Sickle (+31 1d4+5 S; dexterity; master); Spiked Gauntlet (+30 1d4+4 P; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Critical Debilitation: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Double Debilitation: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Impossible Striker: Has increased Sly Striker effects
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Strike: Class Master (Rogue)
Master Tricks: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Nimble Roll: Has increased Nimble Dodge effects
Precise Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Rogue Expertise: Class Expert (Rogue)
Ruffian: Defense Master (Medium Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Tactical Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Thief: +1 damage with finesse melee weapons
Unconventional Expertise (Bastard Sword): Attack Master (Bastard Sword)
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Bastard Sword)
Vicious Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons): Attack Trained (Simple Weapons)
Weapon Tricks: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Battle Assessment: (1) Successful Perception vs. Deception or Stealth DC determines target's strengths and weaknesses
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Brutal Beating: Critical successes on Strikes inflict frightened 1
Debilitating Strike: (F) Successful Strike against a flat-footed foe also inflicts 2 choices from: +2d6 HP precision; flat-footed; weakness 5 to a choice of damage type; clumsy 1; prevent reactions; prevent flanking; slowed 2 until the end of the next turn (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1, critical success negates, and critical failure inflicts paralyzed); -10 Speed until the end of the next turn; enfeebled 1 until the end of the next turn
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 20
Dispelling Slice: (2) Successful sneak attack allows a level 10, +31 counteract attempt to dispel a magical effect
Distracting Feint: Successful Feints inflict -2 Perception and Reflex saves while the target remains flat-footed
Dread Striker: Frightened foes are flat-footed vs. self attacks
Elf Step: (1) Steps twice
Fantastic Leap: (2) Strikes after Long Jump or a High Jump that uses Long Jump distance
Felling Shot: (2) Successful Strike vs. a flat-footed airborne foe inflicts a 120' fall (save Reflex negates; critical failure also inflicts grounded until the end of the next turn)
Gang Up: Foes within reach of an ally are flat-footed vs. self attacks
Improved Poison Weapon: Poisoned weapons inflict +2d4 HP poison, and a critical miss does not waste the poison
Instant Opening: (1) R30' Inflicts flat-footed vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Leave An Opening: Critical hit on a flat-footed foe allows a chosen ally to make an Attack Of Opportunity
Master Strike: (F) Successful Strike on a flat-footed foe inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd once per target per day; (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 2 until the end of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a choice of paralyzed for 4 rd, unconscious for 2 hr, or killed)
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against the triggering attack when unencumbered; success allows a 10' Stride
Opportune Backstab: (R) Strikes a foe immediately after an ally hits it
Poison Weapon: (1) Applies a poison that lasts until the end of the next turn to a piercing or slashing weapon
Powerful Sneak: Can change sneak attack damage to match weapon damage type
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Reactive Distraction: (R) Uses Perfect Distraction to redirect the triggering effect or attack on self to a decoy
Reactive Interference: (R) Prevents an adjacent foe reaction; a higher-level foe requires a successful attack roll
Reactive Pursuit: (R) Moves to remain adjacent to a retreating foe
Ruffian: Can use any simple weapon to sneak attack/Critical hits with a d8 or lighter simple weapon on a flat-footed foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Sabotage: (1) Successful Thievery vs. Reflex inflicts 62 HP damage, or 124 HP on a critical success, to an item with moving parts possessed by a creature within reach
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks, or all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn
Scout's Warning: (F) Gives allies +1 initiative
Sidestep: (R) Redirects a failed Strike on self to an adjacent creature
Skirmish Strike: (1) Steps before or after a Strike
Sly Striker: Successful Strikes with a sneak attack weapon inflict full sneak attack damage
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +4d6 HP precision damage
Spring From The Shadows: (1) Strikes a foe after an undetected Stride
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Trap Finder: +2 Armor Class vs. traps
Twin Feint: (2) Strikes with a melee weapon in each hand; target is flat-footed vs. the second
Twist The Knife: (1) Inflicts 4 HP persistent bleed damage after a successful sneak attack on a flat-footed foe
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict flat-footed vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Wary Disarmament: +2 Armor Class vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits with an unarmed attack, rogue weapon, or a simple agile or finesse weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflict its critical specialization effect
You're Next: (R) After downing a foe, makes a +2 Intimidation check to Demoralize another
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +33 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Slippery Mind: Save Master (Will)
Blank Slate: Immune to detection, revelation and scrying effects of less than counteract level 10
Cognitive Loophole: (R) At the end of a turn, suppresses a mental effect affecting self until the end of the next turn
Defensive Roll: (F) Negates half the damage from an attack that would reduce self to 0 Hit Points once per 10 min
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x HP and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and failed Reflex saves inflict half damage
Nimble Roll: Can use Nimble Dodge on a Reflex save
Slippery Mind: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Trap Finder: +2 vs. traps
Wary Disarmament: +2 saves vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Magic
Spell Slots: AC1: 2; DC1: 2; OC1: 2; PC1: 2 Attack: Arcane: +26 (charisma; trained); Divine: +26 (charisma; trained); Occult: +26 (charisma; trained); Primal: +26 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 36 (charisma; trained); Divine: 36 (charisma; trained); Occult: 36 (charisma; trained); Primal: 36 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Acid Splash (PC1 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid, plus 1 HP persistent acid on a critical success, and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+4 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+4 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+4 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+4 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Dancing Lights (OC1 Evo): (2) R120' Creates 4 floating torch lights in a 10' radius that can be moved 60' each rd while sustained
Daze (DC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 4 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Detect Magic (AC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Magic (DC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Mage Hand (OC1 Evo): (2) R30' Moves a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd moves a Bulk 1 object; 5th extends the range to 60'; 7th moves a Bulk 2 object)
Message (AC1 Ill): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd extends the range to 500')
Tanglefoot (PC1 Con): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts -10 Speed for 1 rd, plus immobilized for 1 rd or until a successful Escape on a critical success (heightened 2nd effects last for 2 rd; 4th effects last for 1 min)
Magic Notes:
Minor Magic (Arcane): Spell Trained (Arcane)/Knows 2 arcane cantrips
Minor Magic (Divine): Spell Trained (Divine)/Knows 2 divine cantrips
Minor Magic (Occult): Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 occult cantrips
Minor Magic (Primal): Spell Trained (Primal)/Knows 2 primal cantrips
Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foes inflict sneak attack damage
Perfect Distraction: (1) Creates a decoy that gives Mislead effects once per 10 min
Trickster's Ace: (R) Previously-specified trigger invokes a prepared spell of up to level 4 on self
